casebody.data:
WELLS FARGO BANK, N.A., s/b/m Wachovia Mortgage Corporation
v.
JC BOHLEMAN, a/k/a J.C. Bohleman, Linda Bohleman, a/k/a Linda J. Bohleman Petition of: JC Bohleman No. 197 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. October 29, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 29th day of October, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
